alert.note: Alert for Henry; Newton; Rockdale; Walton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 10:59PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Rockdale, west central Morgan, northeastern Henry, southeastern Walton and Newton Counties through 1130 PM EDT... At 1058 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Richardson Park to Ebenezer, and moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... McDonough, Conyers, Covington, Madison, Social Circle, Oxford, Porterdale, Rutledge, Newborn, Mansfield, Jersey, Georgia International Horse Park, Ebenezer, Ola, Magnet, Almon, Starrsville, Hard Labor Creek State Park, Brick Store and Herndonville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
